column4: Is there any ubuntu repositories more up to date than the universe ones?
it's some repositories that are run by the ubuntuforums
I'll get you a link to a post on them
Can I point my sources.list at the debian unstable repositories?
you can but it's no longer recommended
and the debian can break your system
will doing a dist-upgrade upgrade me to hoary?
if you change the sources to hoary
replace every occurence of warty with hoary
ok u should b fine then
